actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to make a technical correction relating to sanitary towels (pads) and tampons, diapers and diaper liners for babies and similar articles.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to modify the article description and duty treatment of sanitary towels (pads) and tampons, diapers and diaper liners for babies and similar articles. Grants duty-free treatment of other such articles.

titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to make a technical correction relating to sanitary towels (pads) and tampons, diapers and diaper liners for babies and similar articles.
